name: Veggie Party
description:
Veggie Party Mania is a new flavor of Match-3 puzzle game Veggie Mania from the makers of super hit games Bubble Blossom, Bubble Witch and Baby Bubble Bird ! In the Veggie Tales, you need to draw lines to match three or more adorable veggies to collect them and target the levels. Come on, let's join Chef Princess in a fantastic adventure and get the most fun out of the veggies!

FEATURES:
-- 400+ Well-designed levels - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
-- Multiple cute characters - cuter, sweeter, tasty, yummy and delicious
-- EASY TO LEARN - difficult to master! Try scoring high enough to earn 3 stars on every level?
-- Free gifts - Get lots of free gifts - gems, boosters and special powerup every few minutes.
-- Boosters- Super boosters, extra moves and special power-ups to help with those challenging levels!
-- Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!
-- FREE to play with FREE updates including new levels, obstacles, boosters, and more!


Let's join the Veggie Party !!!!!
